summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hinds Street, from 14th Avenue South to 16th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9514 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
